p: In Fig 3A, the SRS image of day 5 sample, acquired at 2,845 cm -1 and at a fixed focal plane with a 2.5x scanning zoom is reported. Concerning the SRS image at 2,940 cm -1, the pump beam was set at 810 nm and the probe beam wavelength was tuned at 1,063 nm. In Fig 3B, the successfully retrieved protein distribution map in adipocytes is reported (the acquired and unprocessed image is reported in S5B Fig). The simultaneous distribution of proteins (red) and lipids (green) inside adipocytes, obtained by merging Fig 3A and 3B, is shown in Fig 3C.
